title: Is She Gon Pop
lyrics:
A track from the well-worth-the-wait Born Sinner deluxe edition. This is also the third song from the Truly Yours 3. Cole has amazed numerous fans and critics with the Truly Yours EP series.
[Intro]
Yeah
Yeah

hoes jump like Vince Carter

She said "Your guess is good as mine

Left me alone with this baby, I don't hear from the nigga
And to keep it hundred with you, I don't care for the nigga"
